title: Class start reminder
subject: Class start reminder
content:
Hello [#MEMBER_NAME#],

 

This is a friendly reminder that your [#CLASS_TYPE#] will be happening in the next 24 hours.

 

Details:

Class type: [#CLASS_TYPE#]

Date: [#CLASS_DATE#]

Start Time: [#CLASS_START#]

End Time: [#CLASS_END#]

Studio: [#CLASS_STUDIO#]

Location: [#CLASS_LOCATION#]

 

Thank you!
